CALCULATOR1.TEXT: Helpful calculators for landlord or future landlord.
CALCULATOR1.TITLE: Profitability calculator.

CALCULATOR2.TEXT: Calculator to compute property monthly rates
CALCULATOR2.TITLE: Monthly rates

CALCULATOR3.TEXT: Calculator to compute the difference between movement day and first day of next month
CALCULATOR3.TITLE: Calculator partial rent

CALCULATORS.FEATURE1_TEXT: Compute the input output flow and the investment profitability for a given time period by inputing the price, monthly rent, yearly expenses and vaccancy rate.
CALCULATORS.FEATURE2_TEXT: If you are searching for an investment but you are not sure which property is the best, our calculator could prove the best tool in this search.
CALCULATORS.FEATURE3_TEXT: In the case the renter will not move in the first day of the month, compute the difference between movement day and the first day of next month
CALCULATORS.TEXT: Helpful calculators for landlords or future landlords.
CALCULATORS.TITLE: Free calculators

DOCUMENTS.FEATURE2_TEXT: Annex to contract, inventory to be signed along with the renting contract
DOCUMENTS.FEATURE4_TEXT: Template used ending a contract before end of term
DOCUMENTS.TEXT: Different templates used in property renting.
DOCUMENTS.TITLE: Download documents and templates

HOME.FEATURE_AUTOMATE_OPERATIONS_TEXT: Different technical automation used to execute all operations related to the management of contracts and properties.
HOME.FEATURE_CALCULATORS_TEXT: Free calculators for landlords and future landlords
HOME.FEATURE_DOCUMENTS_TEXT: Useful templates for property renting, inventory tracking, subrenting and many others
HOME.FEATURE_HELP_TEXT: Do you need help to navigate and use myImmoAssist? We have available resources.
HOME.FEATURE_PROFESSIONAL_REPORT_TEXT: Personalized and parameterized reports (inventory, contracts, financial forecast and many others).
HOME.FEATURE_QUESTION1_TEXT: To configure a new property, the New Property widget from the main page can be used or, through the Properties menu. Afterwards, on each property the user can configure the utilities, inventory and renting contracts.
HOME.FEATURE_QUESTION1_TITLE: I have a property, how do I configure it?
HOME.FEATURE_QUESTION2_TEXT: All running contracts can be accessed through the  "Contracts" widget from the main page or through the  "Properties"-> "Contracts". Each contract has two sections whcih can be accessed. The actual contract and the payment list.
HOME.FEATURE_QUESTION2_TITLE: How can I see contract details?
HOME.FEATURE_QUESTION3_TEXT: The inventory is the actual list of items that the property comes with. It will be used to generate the annex with items. All items are added through the property menu on "Inventory" section.
HOME.FEATURE_QUESTION3_TITLE: How can I add inventory items and what is actually the property inventory?
HOME.FEATURE_QUESTION4_TEXT: To add invoices to a property, initially the property must have utilities. Those can be added from the  "Utilities" menu. In the case when the robotic processor is configured at the organization level, in this step the details to connect to the utilities web site should be input in here as well.
HOME.FEATURE_QUESTION5_TEXT: Manual through the 'New Invoice'; menu or through the property menu on the 'Invoices' widget, Automatically it is added in the case the organization have the robots configured.
HOME.FEATURE_QUESTION5_TITLE: How can I add a new invoice?
HOME.MAIN_SUBTITLE1: Digital assistant used to automate the management of the invoices, renters, property inventory, payments, contracts and so on.
HOME.MAIN_SUBTITLE2: The time spent to generate notification and perform different computation manually can be used in other way. Our assistant will handle those kind of repetitive actions with great pleasure.
HOME.MAIN_SUBTITLE3: Full transparency between renter and owner/lender. All contract associated expenses (invoices, local taxes and others) are transparent, visible and automatically calculated.
HOME.MAIN_SUBTITLE4: Use artificial intelligence to accelerate processes related to the property management.
HOME.MAIN_SUBTITLE_ADDITIONAL_TEXT: *You can test the assistant right away. No need to input the banking card data.
HOME.NAME: Name
HOME.OFFERED_SOLUTIONS_DETAILS: myImmoAssist assistant comes with a series of utilities very helpful for property or contracts management. Those allows the users to optimist the time spend on those operations or even remove at all the repetitive actions by leveraging automation.
HOME.SECTION_CONTACTUS_TEXT: Digitize and optimize renting operation and contract management. Please contact us for any question, clarification or improvement suggestion or only to say hi.
HOME.SECTION_PAYMENT_TEXT: Try myImmoAssist for three months completely free, there's no need to input card data.
HOME.SECTION_RESOURCES_TEXT: Free resources and advices useful to a lender (documents for renting, calculators, advice and many others).

PERSONALIZED_SOLUTION.CONTACT_TEXT: Contact us to receive a personalized offer
PERSONALIZED_SOLUTION.NAME: Name
PERSONALIZED_SOLUTION.SOLUTION1_SUBTITLE: Solution is distributed into a public cloud AWS/Azure/GCP.
PERSONALIZED_SOLUTION.SOLUTION2_SUBTITLE: Personalized solution on customer requirements and needs.
PERSONALIZED_SOLUTION.SOLUTION3_SUBTITLE: The solution can be distributed on customer cloud (bare-metal or private/hybrid cloud).
PERSONALIZED_SOLUTION.SOLUTION4_SUBTITLE: The solution can be distributed on customer data-center.
PERSONALIZED_SOLUTION.SUBTITLE: Personalized solution on each needs
PERSONALIZED_SOLUTION.TEXT: myImmoAssistant comes in four distribution: public cloud, white-label, private/hybrid cloud or directly installed on each server on it's datacenter.
PERSONALIZED_SOLUTION.TITLE: Personalized solution

PRICING.QUESTION1: Mă costă în plus încasarea facturilor și/sau a chiriei lunare?
PRICING.Q_ANSWER1: Nu, plata acestora se face direct în contul proprietarului specificat în mesajul de notificare.
PRICING.Q_ANSWER2: Proprietar multiplu se referă la faptul că pot să fie doi utilizatori care pot accesa în "mod proprietar" o anumită listă de proprietăți. De exemplu un administrator și proprietarul actual.
PRICING.TEXT: Detalierea planului tarifar pe opțiuni și pe plan-urile posibile.
PRICING.TITLE: Detaliere plan tarifar

SOLUTION1.ITEM1_TEXT: Automate the communication process, create notifications once a new invoice is ready or the status was changed. Additionally, create notifications and compute automatically the total payment at the end of each month.
SOLUTION1.ITEM2_TEXT: Different calculators that calculates profitability per property, amounts what have to be paid and many others.
SOLUTION1.ITEM3_TEXT: Robotic process automation (RPA) on invoices. Automatic download from myElectrica, GDF-Suez, Digit and many others and automatically upload on myImmoAssist.
SOLUTION1.ITEM4_TEXT: Remove the manual process from calculation process using myImmoAssist. Different automatic processes can be configured on the system.
SOLUTION1.ITEM5_TEXT: Semi-automation processing invoices  or full automatic. Full transparency on the whole invoice process. Soon, collect online payments.
SOLUTION1.ITEM5_TITLE: Optimize your time and remove late payment fees.
SOLUTION1.ITEM6_TEXT: Do you want to download all the data on Excel, PDF or Word format? Sure, no problem, you can generate professional report on each device an thereafter those can be redirected to other persons.
SOLUTION1.TEXT: Remain organized by using automation tools. The time spent on notifications and paper computations can be used in other ways. The tools can do this for your.
SOLUTION1.TITLE: Automate operations.

SOLUTION2.EXTRA_DETAILS_SUBTITLE: Folosind utilitarele de notificări plată, reconciliere cheltuieli și auto-pay, tot procesul de colectare de cheltuieli și auditul acestora poate fi complet automat.
SOLUTION2.EXTRA_DETAILS_TEXT:
Inregistrări exacte
                Folosind aceste utilitare de automatizare nu mai este nevoie de validări manuale, navigări între contul
                bancar și contul myImmoAssist, verificare facturi sau alte documente. Tot procesul este acoperit de
                către aplicația myImmoAssist și este complet transparent între proprietar și chiriaș.
                (În curând)
SOLUTION2.FEATURE1_TEXT: Activare colectare online a plăților înregistrate în sistemul myImmoAssist.
SOLUTION2.FEATURE2_TEXT: Confirmarea identității printr-o verificare de securitate a identității.
SOLUTION2.FEATURE3_TEXT: Conectatea contului bancar în care chiriașii vor face plați lunare.
SOLUTION2.QA_TITLE: Detalii adiționale legate de plăți online
SOLUTION2.QUESTION_1_ANSWER: Modalitatea de plată online foloseste aplicația smart2pay.
SOLUTION2.QUESTION_2_ANSWER: Plata online este inclusă în fiecare plan cu 2 per tranzacție. Pentru mai multe detalii vă rugăm navigați la pagina de plăți.
SOLUTION2.QUESTION_3: How much time would it take for the money to reach my account?
SOLUTION2.QUESTION_3_ANSWER: The average transfer time is somewhere between 1 and 5 working days. We are continuously search for ways to improve payment solutions.
SOLUTION2.QUESTION_4_ANSWER: The renter receives an email/sms or a what's up message containing a payment link or directly from the myImmoAssist application.
SOLUTION2.SECTION_TEXT: The whole collecting/validation process is becoming quite easier using the auto-pay and all automations related to property expenses.
SOLUTION2.TEXT: Colectări online de plăți fără niciun efort (În curând). Colectarea chiriei în persoană este un proces încet și nerealist când este vorba de un portofoliu mare. Folosind myImmoAssist procesul de colectare poate să fie automatizat. Este un mod rapid, usor și face colectarea chirieri în persoană istorie.
SOLUTION2.TITLE: Online payments

SOLUTION3.EXTRA_DETAILS_SUBTITLE: Remove errors generate from the human interaction and increase the speed of the accountancy process using myImmoAssist.
SOLUTION3.EXTRA_DETAILS_TEXT: We add and improve continuously the reports functionality. If you have questions or an opinion on which the functionality could be improved, please, don't hesitate to contact us.
SOLUTION3.FEATURE1_TEXT: Any report can be customized depending on start date, property, administrator, payments or many other categories.
SOLUTION3.FEATURE2_TEXT: The user can choose professional templetes that can be generated on different devices (Mobiles, PCs).
SOLUTION3.FEATURE3_TEXT: All reports can be shared with other users of the application (partners, employees or the accountant) directly from the application of via a web portal or mobile.
SOLUTION3.SUBTITLE: Professional reports in few clicks
SOLUTION3.TEXT: Obtain detailed information on overall portfolio performance and understand better what actions must be taken to improve rentability. Compute annual taxes (locals, ANAF) easily, centralized on the whole property portfolio.
SOLUTION3.TITLE: Professional reports
